definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
father's elder brother's wife/aunt (affectionate term for an elderly woman)
Matsu, name of a sea goddess still widely worshipped on the SE China coast and in SE Asia
adoptive mother (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)

sentences.english: Expensive into mom to take care of small into also very tired, she fell asleep sitting there.
sentences.chinese: 贵成妈为照顾小成也很累，她坐在那里就睡着了。
我叫莉莉，是达里加尔的老婆，玛吉的妈。

sentences.english: Patty minded his ridiculing less when her mother was the butt of it.
sentences.chinese: 如果她爸的嘲笑对象是她妈，帕蒂就不怎么介意了。

sentences.english: If it's a letter from Mary, read it out, Mother.
sentences.chinese: 妈，如果是玛丽的来信，就大声念念吧。

sentences.english: Today, my 8 year old little sister said "f you" to my mom.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我8岁的妹妹对我妈说法克鱿。

sentences.english: How the hell is this a tech story?
sentences.chinese: 这他妈怎么是个科技故事？

sentences.english: Yo momma's so ugly, when you look up ugly in the dictionary it has her picture.
sentences.chinese: 你妈是个丑八怪，词典里查丑怪就查出她的脸。

sentences.english: If your wife and your mother fall into the water at the same time, who will you save first?
sentences.chinese: 假如你媳妇和你妈同时掉进水里，你先救谁？

sentences.english: Your Mama's So ugly, the government moved Halloween to her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 你妈太丑了，政府把她的生日定为鬼节。

sentences.english: I went there with my mother and two aunts.
sentences.chinese: 我是和我妈还有二姨舅妈一起去的。

sentences.english: Ma, what present will you want for your birthday?
sentences.chinese: 妈，您生日时想要什么生日礼物呀？

sentences.english: Mum, give me one hundred yuan.
Yo momma's so ugly, she looks like the elephant man chewing on a wasp.
sentences.chinese: 你妈是个丑八怪，活像个嚼咬黄蜂的大笨象。

sentences.english: Yo momma's so ugly, she's the cover girl for iodine.
sentences.chinese: 你妈是个丑八怪，她给碘酒做瓶盖。

sentences.english: Yo momma's so ugly, she'd scare a buzzard off a gut wagon.
sentences.chinese: 你妈是个丑八怪，尸体上的秃鹰都吓走。

sentences.english: Can not save to a network drive or a floppy disk.
sentences.chinese: 无法将它们玻存到一滚硒妈驱动器或踊个软盘。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
